camera.name: camera
camera.description: My camera. No pictures on it. I use its light to see around me. Hope it doesn't run out of batteries...Î©

frontDoorKey.name: key
frontDoorKey.description: Key to the front door. Hopefully now I can get out of here.

journal.name: journal
journal.description: This is my journal... I read it and remember going to the hospital to confront the doctor... About what though?

batteries.name: batteries
batteries.description: Old batteries... Hope they have some juice left.

patientFile.name: file
patientFile.description: You read the file... Patient is Jessica Smith. Held for mental health examination. Room 103. Door code is ####. The rest is illegible. Maybe her room will have an answer?

bandages.name: bandages
bandages.description: Old Bandages... Hope I won't have to use these.

pressPass.name: press-pass
pressPass.description: This belonged to someone... The picture is of me? I'm this person? I need to get out of here.

picture.name: picture
picture.description: This picture...I have seen it before. Why does it look familiar?

fireExtinguisher.name: fire-extinguisher
fireExtinguisher.description: This is heavy, but also has a charge so it might come in handy.

axe.name: axe
axe.description: The blade is dull, but it can generate a lot of force.

firstAidKit.name: first-aid-kit
firstAidKit.description: This has everything I need to ensure I can fix up any wounds.

barbell.name: barbell
barbell.description: It's a good thing I am pretty strong. I could probably throw this at something....

woodCane.name: wood-cane
woodCane.description: This is very well built and easy to swing around.

masterKey.name: master-key
masterKey.description: This says Master on it. I think it will open up all of the rooms in this place....

paperClip.name: paper-clip
paperClip.description: Paper clip. All I need to open simple locks... How do I know this?

tylenol.name: tylenol
tylenol.description: This will help me feel better if I get injured.
